name: 胡憲倫
objective:
學生將會學習從較宏觀的視野來認識屬於人文與社會層面的環境管理。課程將會透過系統思考及永續創新的角度，來反思地球的現在與未來；闡述新經濟時代的來臨與綠色資本主義的重要性及其四種策略，來緩解氣候變遷及全球暖化的趨勢，創造企業競爭優勢，並開創人類永續發展的新契機。
Students will be guided from a broader and global perspective to learn the social and human aspects of protecting the Earth. Lectures will cover systems thinking and its importance to Sustainable Development, Innovation and emerging technologies for sustainability, Natural Capitalism, its strategies, and Circular Economy.
schedule:
Week 1 (12/7) 導論 - 資本主義與永續發展 (綠色資本主義 / 永續發展目標)
             Introduction- Capitalism and Sustainable Development/Natural Capitalism and Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
Week 2 (12/14) 永續創新及提昇資源生產力 Sustainable Innovation, Resource Productivity
Week 3 (12/21) 生物模擬－師法自然
Learning from the Nature- Biomimicry 
Week 4 (12/28) 服務與流動的經濟 (產品服務系統) 及循環經濟 Product Service System (PSS)& Circular Economy
Week 5 (1/4)  金字塔底層及包容性經濟 Bottom of the Pyramid (BOP) & Inclusive Business
Week 6 (12/11)  結語及分組報告 (Conclusion and Group Presentation)
materials:
1.	吳信如譯，Lovins 等原著，綠色資本主義，天下文化，2002
2.	Sachs, J.D. The Age of Sustainable Development, The Wylie Agency (UK), 2015 (周曉琪、羅耀宗譯，永續發展新紀元，天下文化，2017) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EadvEChBNUA
3.	Lovins, A.B. Lovins, L.H. and P. Hawken, A Roadmap for Natural Capitalism, Harvard Business Review, May-June, 145-158, 1999
4.	Senge et al., The Necessary Revolution- How Individuals and Organizations are Working Together to Create a Sustainable World, The Doubleday Publishing Group, 2008 (齊若蘭譯，Peter Senge 原著，必要的革命 - 個人與組織如何共創永續社會，天下文化，2010)
5.	Papers assigned for the class

name: 曾昭衡
objective: 教學大綱：簡介作業研究 Systems Analysis 中的各式優選工具，並學習混沌理論。以生態族群的 Growth and Decay 模式為例，初窺混沌世界的奇妙，以提供往後解決問題時有不同的思考方向。混沌理論應用在物理、經濟、生物、數學的領域上，處理數百年來許多無法看透的問題有不錯進展 (包括紊流現象)，在環境領域上的應用則尚待開拓。只要處理的系統 (問題) 具有自我相似性，以混沌來處理是可行的。(課程中將視時間教進階數學軟體 Mathematica.)  Explore Chaos Theory from the Models of Growth and Decay (Simple Logistic Model, Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity, Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity and Migration).  Introduce important factors of Chaotic Behavior: Dynamics of species, Critical Reproduction Rate, Bifurcation, Butterfly effect.  Examples of Chaotic behavior: Single Species System, Two Species Competition System, Two Species Predator-Prey System.
schedule:
1. 優選工具簡介 Mathematic tools for system analysis
	線性規劃
	時間序列、啟發式演算法、類神經網路、灰色理論 / 模糊理論
	賽局理論、小世界理論
2. Models of Growth and Decay 
	Simple Logistic Model
	Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity
	Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity and Migration
3. Chaotic 混沌 Behavior (week 3 交 HW1)
	Dynamics of species
	Critical Reproduction Rate
	Bifurcation
4. Examples of Chaotic behavior
	Single Species System
	Two Species Competition System
	Two Species Predator-Prey System
5. Butterfly effect 蝴蝶效應. Deterministic or Random? (week 5 交 HW2)
6. Final Exam;

name: 楊任軒
objective:
永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed
schedule:
週次及對應主題如下 (並視上課情況適當調整)
第一週: 1. 反應工程與反應器設計簡介
第二週: 2. 轉化率與反應器尺寸關係
第三週: 3. 速率定律
第四週: 4. 化學計量
第五週: 5. 溫度效應及複雜問題
第六週: 6. 期中考
scorePolicy:
平時成績 (60%)
考試成績 (40%)
